desc: Clean burning, 100% soy wax candles handcrafted for cleaner living. Relatable fragrances reimagined. Modern farmhouse mason jars, apothecary style tumblers, & New Orleans inspired collections. Created in our Virginia farm studio from American-grown soy wax. Made in the U.S.A.

layout.text: Find your new summer favorite with PETITE GOLD TINS
